components.construct: DO.Core.Renderer.UI.SpriteButton(assets, 'continue_btn:Continue_Normal.png', 'continue_btn:Continue_Disable.png', '@collect_caps', 1, {fontFamily : 'Berlin-Sans-FB-Demi-Bold', fontSize: 35, fill : 0xFFFFFF, align : 'center', dropShadow : true, dropShadowBlur : 20,  dropShadowDistance :0, fill : ['#FFFFFF','#FFFFFF ']})

DO.Core.Renderer.UI.StandardText('@you_triggered_caps', {fontFamily : 'immortal', fontSize: 36, fill : 0xFFFFFF, align : 'center', dropShadow : true, dropShadowBlur : 20, fill : ['#FFFFFF','#FFD700 ']})

DO.Core.Renderer.UI.StandardText('@spot_bonus_every_spin', {fontFamily : 'immortal', fontSize: 19, fill : 0xFFFFFF, align : 'center',  dropShadow : true, dropShadowBlur : 20, fill : ['#FFFFFF','#FFD700 '], wordWrap : true, wordWrapWidth : 600 })

DO.Core.Renderer.UI.SpriteButton(assets, 'continue_btn_promo:Continue_Normal.png', 'continue_btn_promo:Continue_Disable.png', '@collect_caps', 1, {fontFamily : 'Berlin-Sans-FB-Demi-Bold', fontSize: 35, fill : 0xFFFFFF, align : 'center', dropShadow : true, dropShadowBlur : 20,  dropShadowDistance :0, fill : ['#FFFFFF','#FFFFFF ']})
